message: Let's split it evenly to start. Your turn!
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a decent chunk too
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still aiming for a decent chunk for myself. Your turn!
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! I need a bigger share to make this worth my while.
I'm not backing down, Alice! You're going to have to do better than that!
I'm running out of time and patience, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to let you get the better of me, Alice! I'm going to make one last push!
I'm begging you, Bob. Take this and let's end this nightmare. I'm barely scraping by as it is.
I'm not going to let you get the better of me, Alice! I'm going to take it all!
